Trait std::ops::DispatchFromDyn[−][src]

#[lang = "dispatch_from_dyn"]pub trait DispatchFromDyn<T> { }
ðŸ”¬ This is a nightly-only experimental API. (dispatch_from_dyn)

This is used for object safety, to check that a methodâ€™s receiver type can be dispatched on.

An example implementation of the trait:

impl<T: ?Sized, U: ?Sized> DispatchFromDyn<Rc<U>> for Rc<T>
where
    T: Unsize<U>,
{}
